assets.description: LOM is the native fee token of Lombard Ledger
assets.name: Lom

assets.description: LBTC is liquid Bitcoin; it's yield-bearing, cross-chain, and 1:1 backed by BTC. LBTC enables yield-bearing BTC to move cross-chain without fragmenting liquidity, and is designed to seamlessly integrate Bitcoin into the decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem while maintaining the security and integrity of the underlying asset
assets.name: Liquid Bitcoin

assets.description: ustake is a syntetic token to implement a PoA with BFT features over CometBFT
assets.name: ustake
